mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PC_REPLY( BRNUM, MNUM, MID, BCNUM, BRCONTENT, DELYN, IDATE, UDATE ) VALUES ( #{brnum}, #{mnum}, #{mid}, #{bcnum}, #{brcontent}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BRNUM BRNUM ,A.MNUM MNUM ,A.MID MID ,A.BCNUM BCNUM ,A.BRCONTENT BRCONTENT ,A.UDATE UDATE FROM PC_REPLY A WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.BCNUM = #{bcnum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PC_REPLY SET DELETEYN = 'N', UDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELYN = 'Y' AND BRNUM = #{brnum}
